Info.Title: Atlas Shrugged: Who Is John Galt?
Info.Writer: James Manera (screenplay), Harmon Kaslow (screenplay), John Aglialoro (screenplay), Ayn Rand (novel)
Info.Actors: Kristoffer Polaha, Laura Regan, Peter Mackenzie, Greg Germann
Info.Plot: In a post-apocalyptic America, the iron fist of the totalitarian government seeks to crush one mysterious man named John Galt, who has the power and influence to change everything..
